content:
@everyone today's Roc nightly was a breaking release. Decoding of records was altered to handle missing fields.

If you're using today's nightly you may (depends on your imports) need to use fresh releases for:

  • basic-cli
  • roc-json
  • basic-webserver

If you use decoding in one of your packages or platforms, you'll need to perform updates similar to these ones:

  • See platform/EnvDecoding.roc (simple)
  • Complex example

Feel free to reach out if you need help with this change!
